title: Common Denominator
text: The fractions have a common denominator, so add the numerators and place the sum over the common denominator

title: Factor
text: Factor the numerator and simplify by removing the common factors.

title: Numerator
text: The numerator can be factored into $$\left(x+3\right) \left(x+4\right)$$
